import asyncio
from sqlalchemy.ext.asyncio import create_async_engine
from sqlalchemy import text

async def enable_extensions\(\):
    engine = create_async_engine\(''postgresql+asyncpg://neondb_owner:npg_MlpAx7Dh1EHb@ep-lingering-smoke-aifunayl.c-4.us-east-1.aws.neon.tech/neondb?ssl=require''\)
    async with engine.begin\(\) as conn:
        await conn.execute\(text\(''CREATE EXTENSION IF NOT EXISTS pg_trgm''\)\)
        await conn.execute\(text\(''CREATE EXTENSION IF NOT EXISTS vector''\)\)
        print\(''Extensions created''\)
    await engine.dispose\(\)

asyncio.run\(enable_extensions\(\)\)
")
